Name: Industrial War
About the game: At the beginning of the 20th century, the Western world entered the era of 'great industrialization', with great technological development in the fields of chemicals, military industry, food, and machinery. 'Industrial War' is based on resources, technology, capital, markets and transportation lines, presenting the construction of each country, colonial plunder, capital penetration and frontal conflicts! The application realistically depicts the economic cycle of the world's major cities and the surrounding industrial and rural areas. You can carefully lay out the construction of each city, port, mine and military fortress in your own country. Fully cooperate in power, resources and production to build a standing country, a powerful economic entity.
Meta Title: Industrial War: Mar 27, 2023, Yocone and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Industrial War? Check out the release date (Mar 27, 2023), developer insights from Yocone, and a complete game summary.
